titlestmt.titleproper: Bruce Anthony King photographs and printed material

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-06 16:06:37 -0400.

did.unittitle: Bruce Anthony King photographs and printed material

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Photographs of artists (1974-1976) and miscellaneous printed material concerning King's photographs (1976-1986).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: REEL 906: One hundred three photographs by King are of Leonard Baskin, his family, his studio, and his home.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: REEL 1817: Six photographs of Harold Hugo, and 2 photographs of Boris Mirski (1974); previously microfilmed under Photos of Artists II and subsequently scanned.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Unfilmed: Photographs of artists (1976-1977) include Giovanni (John) Castano, Beverly Hallam and Mary-Leigh Smart, John Laurent, Judy and Todd McKee and their children, Peter Plamondon and his studio, and Robert C. Vose. Printed material includes photocopies of King's photographs of Joel Janowitz and Maud Morgan. Printed material containing photographs by King includes a book VISION AND REVISION (1979), a magazine SPECTRUM (Spring/Summer 1985), and a calendar NEW ENGLAND IMAGES (1986).

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm reels 906 and 1817 available at Archives of American Art offices and through interlibrary loan.

altformavail.head: Reproduction Note
altformavail.p: Unfilmed photographs of Janowitz and Morgan are photocopies.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Reel 906: Originals returned to the lender, Bruce Anthony King, after microfilming.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Unfilmed photographs of Janowitz and Morgan: Originals in possession of Bruce Anthony King.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Bruce Anthony King, 1975 and 1985.
